name: Site Data
query:
SELECT
    -- Site fields
    s.name AS `Circuit ID`,
    s.exiting_circuit_id AS `Existing Circuit ID`,
    s.site_name AS `Site Name`,
    s.customer AS `Customer`,
    s.order_type AS `Order Type`,
    s.site_type AS `Site Type`,
    s.territory AS `Territory`,
    s.lms_type AS `LMS Type`,
    s.site_status AS `Site Status`,
    s.date AS `Circuit Delivery Date`,
    s.shifted_circuit_id AS `Shifted Circuit ID`,
    s.stage AS `Stock Stage`,
    s.lms_stage AS `LMS Stage`,
    s.customer_type AS `Customer Type`,
    s.site_id__legal_code AS `Site Legal Code`,
    s.solution_name AS `Solution Name`,
    s.managed_services AS `Managed Services`,
    s.config_type AS `Config Type`,
    s.sales_order AS `Sales Order`,
    s.billing_status AS `Billing Status`,
    s.partially_completed_date AS `Partially Completed Date`,
    s.customer_po_no AS `Customer PO No`,

    -- Site Item fields
    si.item_name AS `Item Name`,
    si.qty AS `Quantity`,
    si.status AS `Item Status`,

    -- LMS Site fields
    lms.lms_id AS `LMS ID`,
    lms.lms_supplier AS `LMS Supplier`,
    lms.brandwidth_name AS `Bandwidth Name`,
    lms.bandwith_type AS `Bandwidth Type`,
    lms.stage AS `LMS Status`,
    lms.lms_delivery_date AS `LMS Delivery Date`

FROM
    `tabSite` s
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite Item` si ON si.parent = s.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabLMS Site` lms ON lms.parent = s.name

ORDER BY
    s.name DESC;
